info.title: Payment Receipt Events
info.description:
A Payment Receipt is a receipt given by a business to its customers as proof of purchase after payment has been received for any product or service. The following event is available for payment receipts:

Payment receipt created

x-sap-shortText: Informs a remote system about created payment receipts in an SAP S/4HANA system.

message.description: This event is raised when a payment receipt instance has been created.

sap_s4_beh_PaymentReceipt_Created_v1.name: sap.s4.beh.PaymentReceipt.Created.v1
sap_s4_beh_PaymentReceipt_Created_v1.description: This event is raised when a payment receipt instance has been created.

specversion.description: The version of the CloudEvents specification which the event uses. This enables the interpretation of the context.

type.description: Type of occurrence which has happened. Often this property is used for routing, observability, policy enforcement, etc.

subject.description: The subject of the event in the context of the event producer (identified by source).

time.description: Timestamp of when the occurrence happened. Must adhere to RFC 3339.
